title: Start-ups and perseverance | Jake McKeon
description:
In Episode #1, I sat down with Jake Mckeon, the founder of coconutbowls.com. Jake's story is one of both perseverance and dedication and offers insight into how you can use failed start-ups to build something truly great. From working a 9–5 office job and following a string of 'failed' or 'semi-failed' start-ups, Jake has gone on to create an astronomical business that has reclaimed and sold hundreds of thousands of Coconut Bowls in just the first two years of operating.  
Enjoy, friends. 
Simon

Want to support the show?
